issue.title: [Flight] FlightInfo should use signed integer types for payload size
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4474](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4474). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The de-facto practice is to use -1 in FlightInfo to indicate that the number of records/size of the payload is unknown, looking at the Java implementation. However, the Protobuf definition uses an unsigned integer type, as does the C++ implementation.
